item.name: conditionsDataNotBefore
item.label: NotBefore (minutes)
item.note: The time difference, in minutes, between creation and a time instant at which the assertion is valid

item.name: conditionsDataNotOnOrAfter
item.label: NotOnOrAfter (minutes)
item.note: The time difference, in minutes, between creation and a time instant at which the assertion has expired

item.name: confirmationDataNotBefore
item.label: NotBefore (minutes)
item.note: The time difference, in minutes, between creation and a time instant before which the subject cannot be confirmed

item.name: confirmationDataNotOnOrAfter
item.label: NotOnOrAfter (minutes)
item.note: The time difference, in minutes, between creation and a time instant before which the subject ca no longer be confirmed

item.name: authnStatementDataNotBefore
item.label: NotBefore (minutes)
item.note: The time difference, in minutes, from creation time

item.name: authnStatementDataNotOnOrAfter
item.label: NotOnOrAfter (minutes)
item.note: The time difference, in minutes, from creation time

item.name: attributeStatementNameSimpleForSAML20_1
item.label: Name Simple
item.note: SAML 2.0 require almost one name between simple and qualified

item.name: attributeStatementValues_1
item.label: Value(s)
item.note: Use separator char for define more than one value
